title: Teaching Methodology Practical Competency Enhancement: Elementary Programming Foundational Skills via Unplugged Programming

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain procedures for decomposing everyday problems step-by-step using algorithm design principles
Learners can implement programming logic by applying conditional statements and loops through unplugged activities (card sorting, physical activities, etc.)
Learners can demonstrate procedures for analyzing and correcting errors encountered during programming problem-solving through collaboration with peers
Learners can creatively design real-life scenarios requiring logical sequences of five or more steps using programming knowledge

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
